comments:
Steps to Reproduce:
1.Login to ISC server
2.Import two http logs a>access.log and b>error.log
3.Create an association
4.Save the resources
5.Logout from the ISC. This will unload all the resources for this user.
Following exception occur during logout.
Nested Exception is java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: The 
feature 'adjustedCreationTime' is not a valid changeable feature
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.impl.BasicEObjectImpl.eDynamicUnset
(BasicEObjectImpl.java:558)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.models.cbe.impl.CBECommonBaseEventImpl.eUnset
(CBECommonBaseEventImpl.java)
	at 
org.eclipse.hyades.models.hierarchy.util.EMFUtil.unsetFeaturesInSameResource
(EMFUtil.java)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.models.hierarchy.util.EMFUtil.convertToProxy
(EMFUtil.java)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.models.hierarchy.util.EMFUtil.unload(EMFUtil.java)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.models.hierarchy.util.EMFUtil.unload(EMFUtil.java)
	at 
org.eclipse.hyades.models.hierarchy.util.HierarchyXMIResourceImpl.doShallowUnloa
d(HierarchyXMIResourceImpl.java)
	at

(HierarchyXMIResourceImpl.java)

(ResourceImpl.java:1005)
	at

	at

(ServiceController.java:320)
	at com.ibm.ac.lta.web.ui.WebClientPortlet.logout
(WebClientPortlet.java:260)
	at com.ibm.ac.lta.web.ui.portlets.NavigationPortlet.logout
